title: With a New Nigeria Refinery, Africa’s Richest Man Wants ‘to Rescue the Country’
summary_full: Aliko Dangote, Africa’s richest man, has an ambitious vision for the continent’s most populous nation, but hurdles stand in his way.
summary_public: Aliko Dangote, Africa’s richest man, has an ambitious vision for the continent’s most populous nation, but hurdles stand in his way.
